content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":77541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、早く掘り起こせー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Hurry up and dig it up!\""},{"lineNumber":77542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ほら、崩れた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Look, it collapsed.\""},{"lineNumber":77543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ、とにかくこの高さにいる限り","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, anyway, as long as we stay at this height,"},{"lineNumber":77544,"originalJapaneseLine":"　安全なようだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"it seems to be safe.\""},{"lineNumber":77545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、パットンが今までサボっていたのは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, I don't approve that Patton has been slacking off until now,"},{"lineNumber":77546,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感心せんが、まあ俺様の城を","translatedEnglishLine":"but well, I'll forgive him on the grounds that he flew my castle."},{"lineNumber":77547,"originalJapaneseLine":"　飛ばしたことに免じて許してやろう」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":77548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そりゃ、ありがとうよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, thanks for that.\""},{"lineNumber":77549,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それにこの闘神もいいぞ、うむ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Also, this Fighting God is great, yes."},{"lineNumber":77550,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっても強そうだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Seemingly very strong."},{"lineNumber":77551,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どの戦いにも連れていこう」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll bring it to every battle.\""},{"lineNumber":77552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それは出来ない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That is not possible.\""},{"lineNumber":77553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに？　なんでだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What? Why not?\""},{"lineNumber":77554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は聖櫃から離れられない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I cannot leave the ark.\""},{"lineNumber":77555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せいひつ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ark?\""},{"lineNumber":77556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、今は隣の塔の地下に安置されている、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it is currently enshrined underground in the adjacent tower,"},{"lineNumber":77557,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の本体とも言えるものだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and can be said to be my true body.\""},{"lineNumber":77558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この体と聖櫃が長距離離れすぎると","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If this body and the ark become too far apart,"},{"lineNumber":77559,"originalJapaneseLine":"　闘神のコントロールを失う」","translatedEnglishLine":"I lose control over the Fighting God.\""},{"lineNumber":77560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ、その聖櫃を担いで来ればいいだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, you could just carry the ark with you.\""},{"lineNumber":77561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、それはちょっと難しいぜ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that's a bit difficult."},{"lineNumber":77562,"originalJapaneseLine":"　聖櫃はこの城を飛ばす動力源でもあるんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The ark is also the power source that makes this castle fly.\""},{"lineNumber":77563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もちろん、ランス城を下ろすなら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course, if we land Rance Castle,"},{"lineNumber":77564,"originalJapaneseLine":"　問題は解決するが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"the problem would be solved, but...\""},{"lineNumber":77565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは意味がない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That would defeat the purpose."},{"lineNumber":77566,"originalJapaneseLine":"　結局ランス城が滅茶苦茶にされるじゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"After all, the Rance Castle would just get wrecked.\""},{"lineNumber":77567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つまり、このデカブツは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In other words, this big guy"},{"lineNumber":77568,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス城から離れられないってわけか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"can't leave Rance Castle...\""},{"lineNumber":77569,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmmmm...\""},{"lineNumber":77570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……って、なんだ、それなら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Wait, if that's the case,"},{"lineNumber":77571,"originalJapaneseLine":"　簡単な解決策があるではないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"there's a simple solution.\""},{"lineNumber":77572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、なんだ、それは？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, what is it?\""},{"lineNumber":77573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「簡単なこと！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's simple!"},{"lineNumber":77574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このランス城ごと一緒に来ればいいのだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just bring the whole Rance Castle along with you!\""},{"lineNumber":77575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、最終決戦だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, it's the final battle!\""},{"lineNumber":77576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス城！　魔物の支配地へゴーだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance Castle! Let's go to the monster's territory!"},{"lineNumber":77577,"originalJapaneseLine":"　敵の本拠地を叩く！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll strike the enemy's main base!\""},{"lineNumber":77578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":77579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスの驚く顔が目に浮かぶぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can already picture Kebris's shocked face!\""},{"lineNumber":77580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":77581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":77582,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの命令に応える者は一人もいなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"No one responded to Rance's order."},{"lineNumber":77583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……おい、なにしてる、ゴーだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, what are you doing? Go!\""},{"lineNumber":77584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、えっと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, um..."},{"lineNumber":77585,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゴォー……","translatedEnglishLine":"Go...?"},{"lineNumber":77586,"originalJapaneseLine":"ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is that what you mean?\""},{"lineNumber":77587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ゴー、だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Go.\""},{"lineNumber":77588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、悪いなランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, sorry Rance."},{"lineNumber":77589,"originalJapaneseLine":"　実は、その……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Actually, well...\""},{"lineNumber":77590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この城、上下にしか移動できん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"This castle can only move up and down...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ、とにかくこの高さにいる限り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, anyway, as long as we stay at this height,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、パットンが今までサボっていたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, I don't approve that Patton has been slacking off until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 感心せんが、まあ俺様の城を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but well, I'll forgive him on the grounds that he flew my castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛ばしたことに免じて許してやろう」
「それにこの闘神もいいぞ、うむ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, this Fighting God is great, yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どの戦いにも連れていこう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll bring it to every battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は聖櫃から離れられない」
「うむ、今は隣の塔の地下に安置されている、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it is currently enshrined underground in the adjacent tower,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の本体とも言えるものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and can be said to be my true body."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この体と聖櫃が長距離離れすぎると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If this body and the ark become too far apart,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神のコントロールを失う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I lose control over the Fighting God."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、その聖櫃を担いで来ればいいだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, you could just carry the ark with you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、それはちょっと難しいぜ。
聖櫃はこの城を飛ばす動力源でもあるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ark is also the power source that makes this castle fly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん、ランス城を下ろすなら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, if we land Rance Castle,
the problem would be solved, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局ランス城が滅茶苦茶にされるじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, the Rance Castle would just get wrecked."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城から離れられないってわけか……」
簡単な解決策があるではないか」
このランス城ごと一緒に来ればいいのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just bring the whole Rance Castle along with you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス城！　魔物の支配地へゴーだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance Castle! Let's go to the monster's territory!
We'll strike the enemy's main base!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの驚く顔が目に浮かぶぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can already picture Kebris's shocked face!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの命令に応える者は一人もいなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No one responded to Rance's order.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この城、上下にしか移動できん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This castle can only move up and down..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, I don't approve that Patton has been slacking off until now,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but well, I'll forgive him on the grounds that he flew my castle.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If this body and the ark become too far apart,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神のコントロールを失う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I lose control over the Fighting God."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、その聖櫃を担いで来ればいいだろう」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ark is also the power source that makes this castle fly."

簡単な解決策があるではないか」
このランス城ごと一緒に来ればいいのだ！」

We'll strike the enemy's main base!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの驚く顔が目に浮かぶぜ！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This castle can only move up and down..."
